articles.contents:

              Jonathan Jayes
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        LinkedIn
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        Twitter
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        Email
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            Bio
            “I enjoy some of the old and I enjoy the new. And if I
            can find a balance between it, that’s where I find my
            satisfaction.”
            – Anderson
            .Paak - The Dreamer (feat. Talib Kweli & Timan Family
            Choir)
            
            
            Education
            Lund University | Lund, Sweden
            To begin a PhD in Economic History in August 2021 under
            Prof. Kerstin
            Enflo.
            Exchange Semester | January 2021 - June 2021
            Stellenbosch University | Stellenbosch,
            South Africa
            Masters of Commerce in Economics | January 2020 - July
            2021
            The University of Cape Town | Cape Town,
            South Africa
            Honours in Economics | February 2018 - November 2018
            Bachelor of Social Science in Economics and Economic
            History | February 2015 - November 2017
            
            
            Experience
            Laboratory for the Economics of Africa’s
            Past | Researcher under Prof Johan Fourie|
            January 2020 - July 2021
            FTI Consulting | Junior Economist in Economic
            and Financial Consulting Practice | March 2019 - January
            2020
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Jonathan Jayes
